MARK 9.37 saei ain þize swaleikaize barne andnimiþ ana namin meinamma, mik andnimiþ;
jah saƕazuh saei mik andnimiþ, ni mik andnimiþ, ak þana sandjandan mik.
MARK 9.38 andhof þan imma Iohannes qiþands:
seƕum sumana in þeinamma namin usdreibandan unhulþons, saei ni laisteiþ unsis, jah waridedum imma, unte ni laisteiþ unsis.
ni mannahun auk ist saei taujiþ maht in namin meinamma jah magi sprauto ubilwaurdjan mis;
MARK 9.40 unte saei nist wiþra izwis, faur izwis ist.
MARK 9.41 saei auk allis gadragkjai izwis stikla watins in namin meinamma, unte Xristaus sijuþ, amen qiþa izwis ei ni fraqisteiþ mizdon seinai.
MARK 9.42 jah saƕazuh saei gamarzjai ainana þize leitilane þize galaubjandane du mis, goþ ist imma mais ei galagjaidau asiluqairnus ana halsaggan is jah frawaurpans wesi in marein.
MARK 9.43 jah jabai marzjai þuk handus þeina, afmait þo;
goþ þus ist hamfamma in libain galeiþan, þau twos handuns habandin galeiþan in gaiainnan, in fon þata unƕapnando, MARK 9.44 þarei maþa ize ni gaswiltiþ jah fon ni afƕapniþ.
MARK 9.45 jah jabai fotus þeins marzjai þuk, afmait ina;
goþ þus ist galeiþan in libain haltamma, þau twans fotuns habandin gawairpan in gaiainnan, in fon þata unƕapnando, MARK 9.46 þarei maþa ize ni gaswiltiþ jah fon ni afƕapniþ.
MARK 9.47 jah jabai augo þein marzjai þuk, uswairp imma;
goþ þus ist haihamma galeiþan in þiudangardja gudis, þau twa augona habandin atwairpan in gaiainnan funins, MARK 9.48 þarei maþa ize ni gadauþniþ jah fon ni afƕapniþ.
MARK 9.49 ƕazuh auk funin saltada jah ƕarjatoh hunsle salta saltada.
iþ jabai salt unsaltan wairþiþ, ƕe supuda?
habaiþ in izwis salt jah gawairþeigai sijaiþ miþ izwis misso.
MARK 10.1 Jah jainþro usstandands qam in markom Iudaias hindar Iaurdanau;
jah gaqemun sik aftra manageins du imma, jah, swe biuhts was, aftra laisida ins.
MARK 10.2 jah duatgaggandans Fareisaieis frehun ina, skuldu sijai mann qen afsatjan, fraisandans ina.
Moses uslaubida unsis bokos afsateinais meljan jah afletan.
MARK 10.5 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im:
wiþra harduhairtein izwara gamelida izwis þo anabusn.
MARK 10.6 iþ af anastodeinai gaskaftais gumein jah qinein gatawida guþ.
MARK 10.7 inuh þis bileiþai manna attin seinamma jah aiþein seinai, MARK 10.8 jah sijaina þo twa du leika samin, swaswe þanaseiþs ni sind twa, ak leik ain.
MARK 10.9 þatei nu guþ gawaþ, manna þamma ni skaidai.
MARK 10.10 jah in garda aftra siponjos is bi þata samo frehun ina.
saƕazuh saei afletiþ qen seina jah liugaiþ anþara, horinoþ du þizai.
MARK 10.12 jah jabai qino afletiþ aban seinana jah liugada anþaramma, horinoþ.
MARK 10.13 þanuh atberun du imma barna, ei attaitoki im:
iþ þai siponjos is sokun þaim bairandam du.
MARK 10.14 gasaiƕands þan Iesus unwerida jah qaþ du im:
letiþ þo barna gaggan du mis jah ni warjiþ þo, unte þize swaleikaize ist þiudangardi gudis.
saei ni andnimiþ þiudangardja gudis swe barn, ni þauh qimiþ in izai.
MARK 10.16 jah gaþlaihands im, lagjands handuns ana þo þiuþida im.
MARK 10.17 jah usgaggandin imma in wig, duatrinnands ains jah knussjands baþ ina qiþands:
laisari þiuþeiga, ƕa taujau ei libainais aiweinons arbja wairþau?
MARK 10.18 iþ is qaþ du imma:
ni ƕashun þiuþeigs, alja ains guþ.
